languages.text: Похороны старого пирата Денза Беллардо обнажили не меньше пороков общества, чем его неправедная жизнь.
The funeral of the old pirate Denz Bellardo exposed the vices of society just as much as Denz's own.
languages.original_text: Похороны старого пирата Денза Беллардо обнажили не меньше пороков общества, чем его неправедная жизнь.

traits.locale_text: The funeral of the old pirate Denz Bellardo exposed the vices of society just as much as Denz's own.
The funeral of the old pirate Denz Bellardo exposed the vices of society just as much as Denz's own.
The funeral of the old pirate Denz Bellardo exposed the vices of society just as much as Denz's own.
The funeral of the old pirate Denz Bellardo exposed the vices of society just as much as Denz's own.

languages.text: 老海盗丹兹·贝拉多的葬礼暴露了在场宾客的恶行，也暴露了丹兹本人的恶行。
languages.original_text: The funeral of the old pirate Denz Bellardo exposed the vices of society just as much as Denz's own.

traits.locale_text: 老海盗丹兹·贝拉多的葬礼暴露了在场宾客的恶行，也暴露了丹兹本人的恶行。

languages.text: 老海賊デンツ・ベラルドの葬儀は、デンツ自身の悪徳と同様の社会の悪徳を露呈させた。
languages.original_text: The funeral of the old pirate Denz Bellardo exposed the vices of society just as much as Denz's own.

traits.locale_text: 老海賊デンツ・ベラルドの葬儀は、デンツ自身の悪徳と同様の社会の悪徳を露呈させた。

languages.text: El funeral del antiguo pirata Denz Bellardo ha expuesto tanto los vicios de la sociedad como los del propio Denz.
languages.original_text: The funeral of the old pirate Denz Bellardo exposed the vices of society just as much as Denz's own.

traits.locale_text: El funeral del antiguo pirata Denz Bellardo ha expuesto tanto los vicios de la sociedad como los del propio Denz.

languages.text: Die Begräbnisfeier des alten Piraten Denz Bellardo hat die Laster der Gesellschaft ebenso offenbart wie die seinen.
languages.original_text: The funeral of the old pirate Denz Bellardo exposed the vices of society just as much as Denz's own.

traits.locale_text: Die Begräbnisfeier des alten Piraten Denz Bellardo hat die Laster der Gesellschaft ebenso offenbart wie die seinen.

languages.text: Les funérailles de Denz Bellardo ont révélé au grand jour les vices de la société en même temps que ceux de l'ancien pirate.
languages.original_text: The funeral of the old pirate Denz Bellardo exposed the vices of society just as much as Denz's own.

traits.locale_text: Les funérailles de Denz Bellardo ont révélé au grand jour les vices de la société en même temps que ceux de l'ancien pirate.

languages.text: Eski korsan Denz Bellardo'nun cenazesi, Denz'in olduğu kadar toplumun da ahlaksızlığını gözler önüne serdi.
languages.original_text: The funeral of the old pirate Denz Bellardo exposed the vices of society just as much as Denz's own.

traits.locale_text: Eski korsan Denz Bellardo'nun cenazesi, toplumun kirlenmişliğini, Denz'in kendisi kadar net bir şekilde gözler önüne serdi.
